title: 1788...et demi
overview: Meet the Saint-Azur family just before the French revolution. The noble family consisting of the Count of Saint-Azur (the father) who design cannons in order to take out the English fleet, the oldest sister Victoire, scientist and herbalist, Pauline the middle sister, who enjoys frivolity and fashion, and finally Pauline the youngest one, a bit of a burned head.
